function getRiskScore(address addr) external view returns (uint8)
function updateRiskData(address addr, uint256 totalTxs, uint256 flaggedTxs) external
function isHighRisk(address addr) external view returns (bool)
function getRiskData(address addr) external view returns (tuple(uint8 riskScore, uint256 lastUpdate, uint256 totalTransactions, uint256 flaggedTransactions, bytes32[] threatPatterns))
event RiskScoreUpdated(address indexed addr, uint8 newRiskScore, uint256 timestamp)
event RiskDataUpdated(address indexed addr, uint256 totalTransactions, uint256 flaggedTransactions, uint256 timestamp)
